issue.title: [C++][Benchmarking] Add AsofJoin Ordering Assertion and Benchmark Fixes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17278](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17278). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- Add a invalid status if batches are ingested in an incorrect order for any source
   \* Fix benchmarks to force using isolated memory pools and reusing to prevent OOM.
